question.otazka: Which of the following are the address ranges of the private IP addresses? (Choose three.)
Which two functions of the OSI model occur at layer two? (Choose two.)
Refer to the exhibit. What function does router RT_A need to provide to allow Internet access for hosts in this network? VIZ OBRAZEK
What is true regarding network layer addressing? (Choose three.)

Refer to the exhibit. Host A attempts to establish a TCP/IP session with host C. During this attempt, a frame was captured with the source MAC address 0050.7320.D632 and the destination MAC address 0030.8517.44C4. The packet inside the captured frame has an IP source address 192.168.7.5, and the destination IP address is 192.168.219.24. At which point in the network was this packet captured? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. Assume all devices are using default configurations. How many subnets are required to address the topology that is shown? VIZ OBRAZEK
A technician is asked to secure the privileged EXEC mode of a switch by requiring a password. Which type of password would require this login and be considered the most secure?

Refer to the exhibit. A technician is working on a network problem that requires verification of the router LAN interface. What address should be pinged from this host to confirm that the router interface is operational? VIZ OBRAZEK
Which OSI layer does IP rely on to determine whether packets have been lost and to request retransmission?
When connectionless protocols are implemented at the lower layers of the OSI model, what is usually used to acknowledge that the data was received and to request the retransmission of missing data?
question.spravna: an upper-layer, connection-oriented protocol or service

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Host C is able to ping 127.0.0.1 successfully, but is unable to communicate with hosts A and B in the organization. What is the likely cause of the problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The subnet mask on host C is improperly configured.
question.spatna: Hosts A and B are not on the same subnet as host C.
The IP addresses on the router serial interfaces are wrong.
The FastEthernet interface fa0/0 of router 1 is wrongly configured.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Which list refers only to end devices? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. Host A sends a frame with the destination MAC address as FFFF.FFFF.FFFF. What action will the switch take for this frame? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: It will send the frame to all hosts except host A.
question.spatna: It will send the frame back to host A.
It will forward the frame to the default gateway.

question.otazka: Which subnet mask will allow 2040 hosts per subnet on the IP network 10.0.0.0?

Refer to the exhibit. RouterB is configured properly. The Ethernet interface Fa0/0 of RouterA is configured with the use of the commands that are shown. However, a ping from the Fa0/0 interface of RouterA to the Fa0/0 interface of RouterB is unsuccessful. What action should be taken on RouterA to solve this problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Use the no shutdown command on the FastEthernet interface Fa0/0.
question.spatna: Use the description command on the FastEthernet interface Fa0/0.
Configure the clock rate of the FastEthernet interface Fa0/0.

question.otazka: To send data through a network, what two flags are used to establish a session? (Choose two.)
Which statement is true about the TTL value of an IPv4 packet?
question.spatna: It determines the priority of a packet.
question.spravna: It specifies the remaining “life” of the packet.
question.spatna: It indicates that the packet has been fragmented.
It denotes the data payload type that the packet is carrying.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Communication for hosts X and Y is restricted to the local network. What is the reason for this? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The gateway addresses are broadcast addresses.
question.spatna: Host X is assigned a network address.
Host Y is assigned a multicast address.
Host X and host Y belong to different networks.

question.otazka: What type of network is maintained if a server takes no dedicated role in the network?
A routing issue has occurred in your internetwork. Which of the following type of devices should be examined to isolate this error?
Which physical component is used to access and perform the initial configuration on a new unconfigured router? VIZ OBRAZEK
A user sees the command prompt: Router(config-if)# . What task can be performed at this mode?
What is the correct order for PDU encapsulation? VIZ OBRAZEK
What information can be gathered by using the command netstat?
How can ARP be used to help document the network?
question.spatna: It can list each hop on the way to a destination host.
It can show the average latency of hosts on the network.
question.spravna: It can provide a list of physical addresses on the network.
question.spatna: It can indicate which hosts are not responding to network traffic.

question.otazka: What is the protocol data unit that is associated with the data link layer of the OSI reference model?
Which application layer protocol allows administrators to log into a server from remote locations and control a server as though logged in locally?
Which statement identifies the DNS protocol?
question.spatna: It transmits information using TCP port 25.
It transfers and conveys information using HTML pages.
question.spravna: It matches a resource name with the required network address.
question.spatna: It requests and assigns an IP address, default gateway, and server addresses to hosts.

question.otazka: Which password would allow a user to establish a Telnet session with a Cisco device?
Which identifier is contained in the header of the Layer 2 Ethernet frame?
What happens when a node on an Ethernet network is creating a frame and it does not have the destination MAC address?
question.spatna: The node sends out a Layer 3 broadcast message.
The node sends a message directly to the router for the address.
question.spravna: The node sends out an ARP request with the destination IP address.

question.otazka: An administrator makes changes to the default configuration of a router and saves them to NVRAM. After testing, it is discovered that the configurations did not have the desired effect and must be removed. What steps must be taken to remove the changes and return the router to the default configuration?
question.spatna: Use no version of the commands that are issued.
question.spravna: Issue the erase startup-config command, and then reboot the router.
question.spatna: Issue the erase running-config command, and then reboot the router.

question.otazka: A network administrator is tasked with connecting two workgroups that are configured to use different subnets. Which device should be selected to allow connectivity between users on the two networks?
Which two programs can be used to accomplish terminal emulation for configuring a router from the CLI through the console port? (Choose two.)
Which statement accurately describes file sharing in a peer-to-peer network?
question.spatna: Files are typically stored on the most powerful peer in the network.
Peers can either make requests, or respond to requests, but not both.

question.otazka: What are two primary responsibilities of the Ethernet MAC sublayer? (Choose two.)
Which router configuration mode would an administrator use to configure the router for SSH or Telnet login access?

Refer to the exhibit. Which device should be included in the network topology to provide Layer 2 connectivity for all LAN devices, provide multiple collision domains, and also provide a connection to the rest of the network? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. A technician has been asked to test connectivity from PC1 to a remote network. Which action will indicate if there is remote connectivity? VIZ OBRAZEK
What purpose does a hostname serve on a router?
question.spatna: uniquely identifies a router on the internet
used by routing protocols to identify peer routers
question.spravna: provides device identification to users logging on remotely
question.spatna: determines the hosts that are allowed to connect to the device

question.otazka: Which prompt is associated with the privileged exec mode?

A technician wishes to connect two computers to move data from one to the other before reloading the operating system. The NICs on both PCs do not support autosensing feature. Which procedure will satisfy the requirement?
question.spatna: Interconnect the two PCs with a rollover cable.
Interconnect the two PCs with two rollover cables and a hub.
question.spravna: Interconnect the two PCs with a crossover cable.
question.spatna: Interconnest the two PCs with two crossover cables and a hub.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Interface Fa0/0 on router A is generating excessive broadcast traffic. Which LAN segments will affected by the excessive broadcasts? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Only the 192.168.1.200/30 network will be affected.
question.spatna: Only the link between 192.168.1.201 and port Fa0/5 on SW1 will be affected.
Both the 192.168.1.200/30 and 192.168.1.204/30 networks will be affected.
Only the links between 192.168.1.201 and port Fa0/7 on SW2 will be affected.

question.otazka: Two routers are connected via their serial ports in a lab environment. The routers are configured with valid IP addresses, but they cannot ping each other. The show interface serial0/0 command shows that the serial0/0 interface is up but the line protocol is down. What could be the cause of this problem?
question.spatna: The no shutdown command has not been applied to the interfaces.
question.spravna: The clock rate command has not been entered on the DCE interface.
question.spatna: The interface timers are not cleared.
The FastEthernet interface is emulating a serial interface by assigning it a timing signal.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Which layered network model is shown in the diagram? VIZ OBRAZEK

Refer to the exhibit. Host A is unable to reach host B on the remote network. A technician attempted to ping the local gateway and the ping was successful. To verify the host configuration, the technician issued the ipconfig command. What is the likely cause of the problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The default gateway on host A is incorrectly configured.
question.spatna: The local NIC is incorrectly configured.
The subnet mask on host A is incorrectly configured.
The IP address on host A is incorrectly configured.

question.otazka: Which option shows how a router will route packets to a remote network? VIZ OBRAZEK

A network administrator is configuring several switches for a network. The switches have similar configurations and only minor differences. The administrator wants to save all commands that are issued on the first switch to a text file for editing. Which transfer option should be selected in HyperTerminal? VIZ OBRAZEK
When must a router serial interface be configured with the clock rate command?
question.spatna: when the interface is functioning as a DTE device
when the interface timers have been cleared
when the connected DTE device is shut down
question.spravna: when the interface is functioning as a DCE device
The entries specify four Telnet lines for remote access.
Access will be permitted for Telnet using “c13c0” as the password.
question.spatna: The entries specify three Telnet lines for remote access.
The entries set the console and Telnet password to “c13c0”.
Telnet access will be denied because the Telnet configuration is incomplete.

question.otazka: Which password is automatically encrypted when it is created?
Refer to the exhibit. A network technician is trying to determine the correct IP address configuration for Host A. What is a valid configuration for Host A? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: IP address: 192.168.100.20; Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.240; Default Gateway: 192.168.100.17
question.spatna: IP address: 192.168.100.19; Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.248; Default Gateway: 192.16.1.2
IP address: 192.168.100.21; Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.248; Default Gateway: 192.168.100.18
IP address: 192.168.100.22; Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.240; Default Gateway: 10.1.1.5
IP address: 192.168.100.30; Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.240; Default Gateway: 192.168.1.1
IP address: 192.168.100.31; Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.240; Default Gateway: 192.168.100.18

question.otazka: Which prompt represents the appropriate mode used for the copy running-config startup-config command ?
Refer to the exhibit. The tracert command is initiated from PC1 to PC4. Which device will send a response to the initial tracert packet from PC1? VIZ OBRAZEK
Which information is used by the router to determine the path between the source and destination hosts?
question.spatna: the host portion of the IP address
question.spravna: the network portion of the IP address

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. A PC is communicating with another PC on a remote network. The two networks are connected by three routers. Which action will help to identify the path between the hosts? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Use the tracert command at the host.
question.spatna: Use the ipconfig command at the host.
Use the ipconfig/all command at the destination.
Use the ping command at the destination.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. The diagram represents the process of sending e-mail between clients. Which list correctly identifies the component or protocol used at each numbered stage of the diagram? VIZ OBRAZEK

Refer to the exhibit. The router of the company failed and was replaced. After the replacement, hosts C and D in the Education office are able to ping each other, but they are unable to access the hosts in the Accounts office. What is the likely cause of the problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The subnet mask at the fa0/1 interface of the router is incorrectly entered.
question.spatna: The IP address at the fa0/0 interface of the router is incorrectly configured.
The IP address at the serial interface of the router is incorrectly configured.
The hosts in the Accounts office are not on the same subnet as the hosts in the Education office.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Host A and B are unable to communicate with each other. What is the reason for this? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The gateway addresses are network addresses.
question.spatna: Host A is assigned a network address.
Host B is assigned a multicast address.
Host A and host B belong to different networks.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Host B attempts to establish a TCP/IP session with host C. During this attempt, a frame was captured at the FastEthernet interface fa0/1 of the San Francisco router. The packet inside the captured frame has the source IP address 10.10.1.2, and the destination IP address is 10.31.1.20. What is the destination MAC address of the frame at the time of capture? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. While configuring a network, a technician wired each end of a Category 5e cable as shown. Which two statements are true about this setup? (Choose two.) VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The cable is suitable for connecting a switch to a router Ethernet port.
The cable is suitable for connecting dissimilar types of devices.
question.spatna: The cable is unusable and must be rewired.
The cable is terminated in a way that the transmit pin is wired to the receive pin.
The cable simulates a point-to-point WAN link.

question.otazka: Well-known services and applications use which range of TCP/UDP port numbers?
Which three IPv4 addresses represent subnet broadcast addresses? (Choose three.)
Which three statements are true about network layer addressing? (Choose three.)
question.spatna: Network layer addressing is used by Ethernet switches to make forwarding decisions.
question.spravna: A portion of the address is used to identify the network.

question.otazka: Which OSI layer addressing is required to route packets between two networks?
Refer to the exhibit. Host A is requesting a web page from the web server. Which option represents the socket to which the request is made? VIZ OBRAZEK
Which statement describes the correct use of addresses to deliver an e-mail message from HostB to the e-mail service that is running on ServerA? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Router B uses a Layer 3 network address to route the packet.
question.spatna: HostB uses the MAC address of ServerA as the destination.
Router A uses the Layer 4 address to forward the packet to Router B.
Via the use of a Layer 3 address, ServerA assigns the message to the e-mail service.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Host A is configured with the correct IP address for the default gateway of the router R1 FastEthernet0/1 interface. How will a packet that is sent from host A to host B be handled by the devices on the network? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: R1 will forward the packet to its default gateway, the next hop router R2. R2 will forward the packet to the directly connected network 10.1.1.0/24.
question.spatna: R1 will drop the packet because R1 does not have a specific route in its routing table to the 10.1.1.0/24 network.
R1 will forward the packet to its default gateway, the next hop router R2. R2 will drop the packet because it does not have a default route to network 10.1.1.0/24.
R1 will forward the packet to its default gateway, the next hop router R2. R2 will drop the packet because it does not have a route that is learned by a routing protocol to network 10.1.1.0/24.

question.otazka: Which option correctly identifies the interface or interfaces used to connect the router to a CSU/DSU for WAN connectivity? VIZ OBRAZEK
How many host addresses may be assigned when using the 128.107.0.0 network address with a subnet mask of 255.255.248.0?
During the encapsulation process, what is the PDU of the internet layer?
Which service is used when the nslookup command is issued on a computer?

Refer to the exhibit. A network technician creates equal-sized subnets of network 192.168.2.0/24 using the subnet mask 255.255.255.224. If the technician wishes to calculate the number of host addresses in each subnet by using the formula that is shown in the exhibit, what value will be used for n? VIZ OBRAZEK
What are the default terminal emulation software settings when configuring a Cisco device through a console port?
question.spatna: Bits per second: 19200; Data bits: 7; Parity: None; Stop bits: 0;Flow control: None
question.spravna: Bits per second: 9600; Data bits: 8; Parity: None; Stop bits: 1; Flow control: None
question.spatna: Bits per second: 19200; Data bits: 7; Parity: None; Stop bits: 0; Flow control: Hardware
Bits per second: 9600; Data bits: 8; Parity: None; Stop bits: 1; Flow control: Hardware

question.otazka: In a packet-switched data network, what is used to reassemble the packets in the correct order at the destination device?

Refer to the exhibit. A network administrator tries to test the connectivity between routers R1 and R2, but the attempt to ping is unsuccessful. Based on the show ip interface brief command outputs, what could be the possible cause of the problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Interface S0/0/0 on router R1 is configured with an incorrect IP address.
question.spatna: Interface S0/0/0 on router R1 is shut down.
Interface S0/0/0 on router R2 is administratively down.
Interface S0/0/0 on router R2 does not have the clock rate settings configured.

question.otazka: Which router configuration mode will require user authentication if an administrator issues the enable secret command?
Which location of router memory is cleared with the erase startup-config command?
Which subnet mask should be used for a Class B network that is divided into subnets and will accommodate between 800 hosts and 1000 hosts?

Refer to the exhibit. The network containing router B is experiencing problems. A network associate has isolated the issue in this network to router B. What action can be preformed to correct the network issue? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: issue the no shutdown command on interface FastEthernet 0/1
question.spatna: issue the clock rate command on interface Serial 0/0/0
issue the description command on interface Serial 0/0/1
issue the ip address command on interface FastEthernet 0/0

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. A web browser running on host PC1 sends a request for a web page to the web server with an IP address 192.168.1.254/24. What sequence of steps will follow in order to establish the session before data can be exchanged? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The session will be initiated using TCP. A three-way handshake must be successfully completed before the session is established.
question.spatna: The session will be initiated using UDP. No additional acknowledgment will be required to establish the session.
The session will be initiated using TCP. No additional acknowledgment will be required to establish the session.
The session will be initiated using UDP. The returned web page will serve as an acknowledgment for session establishment.

question.otazka: What is the effect of using the Router# copy running-config startup-config command on a router?
question.spatna: The contents of ROM will change.
The contents of RAM will change.
question.spravna: The contents of NVRAM will change.
question.spatna: The contents of flash will change.

question.otazka: Which option represents a point-to-point logical topology diagram? VIZ OBRAZEK
In a network design project, a network designer needs to select a device to provide collision free connections to 40 hosts on the LAN. Which device should be selected?
Which communication tool allows real-time collaboration?
Which range of port numbers are reserved for services that are commonly used by applications that run on servers?

Refer to the exhibit. An employee wants to access the organization intranet from home. Which intermediary device should be used to connect the organization intranet to the Internet to enable this access?
Which OSI layer manages data segments?
Which two types of media can provide bandwidth up to 1 Gb/s? (Choose two.)

question.spravna: Users who attempt to connect to the console port of the router must enter a password.
The entries permit access through the console by the use of j1mdi2 as the password.
question.spatna: The entries eliminate the need for authentication.
Access through the console will be denied because the console configuration is incomplete.
The entries prevent passwords from being displayed as plain text.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. When host A sends a frame addressed for host D, which hosts will receive the frame? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spatna: only hosts B, C, and D

question.otazka: A user enters http://www.cisco.com/web1.htm in the address line of a browser. Which statement is true about this transaction?
question.spravna: The “http” portion indicates the protocol that is being used.
question.spatna: The “web1.htm” portion is the specific service name.
The retrieved web page will be displayed in URL code.
The “www.cisco.com” is the name of the web page file that is called

question.otazka: The tracert 10.1.3.2 command was issued on computer A. Computer A can ping other addresses on the local subnet. Computer A sent the first ICMP packet toward computer B with a TTL value of 1. A protocol analyzer that was running on computer B showed that the packet never reached its destination. Why did the packet not reach the destination? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The TTL for the packet was decreased to zero by R1.
question.spatna: There is a TCP/IP problem on computer A.
There is a routing loop between R1 and R2.
R1 does not have a route for the destination network.

question.otazka: What can the user do from the command prompt, Router(config-line)# ?
question.spatna: Configure one of the network interfaces.
question.spravna: Configure one of the physical or virtual lines.
question.spatna: Verify the running configuration on the device.
Configure the parameters for one of the routing protocols.

question.otazka: Which option shows the PDU that contains the Layer 3 source and destination addressing for a packet? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. The ping 127.0.0.1 command is issued on the local host. What do the ping results indicate? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The TCP/IP stack on the local host operates properly.
question.spatna: The local host can send packets on the local network.
The local host has full connectivity to the default gateway.
The local host has full connectivity to the remote network.

question.otazka: Which topology divides the collision domain and provides full media bandwidth to the hosts in the network? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. Which option correctly identifies the network address, range of host addresses, and the broadcast address for the network that contains host A? VIZ OBRAZEK

A technician is setting up a workgroup for six users and wants to allow users to share files without setting up a server. Which application layer protocol will provide for peer-to-peer file sharing in a workgroup?
Which router component will have contents erased when the command erase startup-config is issued?
Refer to the exhibit. Host1 is in the process of setting up a TCP session with Host2. Host1 has sent a SYN message to begin session establishment. What happens next? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Host2 sends a segment with the ACK flag = 1, SYN flag = 1 to Host1.
question.spatna: Host1 sends a segment with the ACK flag = 0, SYN flag = 0 to Host2.
Host1 sends a segment with the ACK flag = 1, SYN flag = 0 to Host2.
Host1 sends a segment with the ACK flag = 1, SYN flag = 1 to Host2.
Host2 sends a segment with the ACK flag = 0, SYN flag = 1 to Host1.
Host2 sends a segment with the ACK flag = 1, SYN flag = 0 to Host1.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Host A is able to access resources on the local LAN but is unable to access any resources on the Internet. What is the likely cause of this problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The default gateway is on a different subnet from the host.
question.spatna: The host subnet mask in incorrect.
The host address is a network address.

question.otazka: What is described by the network access layer of the TCP/IP model?
question.spatna: rules for packet acknowledgment, error recovery, and sequencing
question.spravna: rules for the handoff from the internet layer to the network access protocols
question.spatna: rules for how source and destination hosts exchange data between programs
rules for determining which processes can be used to route messages through an internetwork

question.otazka: Which two factors contribute to the increased throughput when all nodes of a LAN are connected to a switch instead of a hub? (Choose two.)
A network technician has made a UTP cable that is terminated as T568A on one end and T568B on the opposite end. What type of cable has been constructed?
Which application belongs to the category of the client/server model?
question.spravna: using Telnet to access a router
question.spatna: printing a document to a locally connected printer
scanning a document with a directly connected scanner

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Which two layers of the OSI model describe the same functions as the transport and internet layers of the TCP/IP model? (Choose two.) VIZ OBRAZEK
What command can be used to troubleshoot domain name resolution issues?
Refer to the exhibit. For connecting two routers with an Ethernet crossover cable, which interface should be used? VIZ OBRAZEK
Which three addresses belong to the category of public IP addresses? (Choose three.)
Refer to the exhibit. What two facts can be determined from the session information that is displayed? (Choose two.) VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The protocol is a connection-oriented protocol.
This exchange is part of the three-way handshake.
question.spatna: The SYN flag is representing the initial establishment of a session.
The destination port indicates that an FTP session has been initiated.
The source port does not support communication with the destination port that is listed.

question.otazka: What is the effect of the command copy running-config tftp?
question.spatna: copies the configuration from a remote machine into RAM
copies the configuration from a remote machine into NVRAM
question.spravna: copies the configuration currently in RAM to a remote machine
question.spatna: copies the configuration currently in NVRAM to a remote machine

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of network design is shown? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. A network administrator remotely accesses the CLI of RouterB from PC1 using Telnet. Which statement is true about this connection? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spatna: A Telnet server process is running on PC1.
question.spravna: The connection is made through a VTY session on the router.
question.spatna: A GET request was sent to RouterB to retrieve data during this session.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. A network technician wants to connect host A to the console of a Cisco switch to initialize the configuration. What type of cable is required for this connection? VIZ OBRAZEK

A technician makes several changes to the running configuration on a router, but the desired results are not achieved. The technician issues the reload command. What action will be taken by the router?
question.spatna: All changes will be lost and the router will restart immediately.
Changes will be saved automatically and the router will restart.
question.spravna: The user will be prompted to save changes before the router restarts.
question.spatna: The router will detect changes to the running configuration and will reload using the configuration stored in RAM.

question.otazka: A network administrator is asked to design a new addressing scheme for a corporate network. There are 60 users in the main office, 40 users in the branch office, 28 users in manufacturing, 12 in the sales office, and 4 users in the research office. Which VLSM addressing scheme that uses the 192.168.88.0/24 network will fulfill the requirements while wasting the fewest addresses?

Refer to the exhibit. The serial interface of the router was configured with the use of the commands that are shown. The router cannot ping the router that is directly connected to interface serial 0/0/0. What should the network technician do to solve this problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Configure an IP address on interface serial 0/0/0.
question.spatna: Configure the description at interface serial 0/0/0.
Remove the no shutdown command at interface serial 0/0/0

question.otazka: Which answer lists the CLI mode hierarchy from least to most specific?
Which router component will have contents erased when the command erase startup-config is issued?
Which three commands will change the current configuration mode of a router? (Choose three.)
Refer to the exhibit. Which Layer 2 protocol could be used inside nework A and network C? Viz Obrazek
UDP is the transport layer protocol for which application?
Refer to the exhibit. Host A wants to connect to host B on a different network. Which three IP addresses can be assigned to host A to enable this connectivity? (Choose three.) (missing picture!!!)
Which device should be used for enabling a host to communicate with another host on a different network?
Refer to the exhibit. What is the total amount of RAM on the router? (missing picture!!!)
Which statement is true about router hostnames?
question.spravna: A hostname should be unique on each router.
question.spatna: A router hostname cannot contain capital letters.
A router hostname is configured in privileged executive mode.
A router hostname must be created before any other configurations can be added to the device.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. The network administrator for a small advertising company has chosen to use the 192.168.5.96/27 network for internal LAN addressing. As shown in the exhibit, a static IP address is assigned to the company web server. However, the web server cannot access the Internet. The administrator verifies that local workstations with IP addresses that are assigned by a DHCP server can access the Internet, and the web server is able to ping local workstations. Which component is incorrectly configured? VIZ OBRAZEK
In which scenario would a crossover cable be required between Ethernet ports on the devices?

Refer to the exhibit. The Wireshark output shows details of frame 456, which was captured after a ping command was issued. Based on the output that is shown, what is the Layer 3 address of the source computer? VIZ OBRAZEK
Which topology represents a collision-free environment? VIZ OBRAZEK

A network has grown too large for technicians to configure network addresses and hosts files for name resolution. Which two application layer services should be added to the server to allow these needs to be satisfied dynamically? (Choose two.)
Which Layer 4 protocol is used to transport voice packets in a VoIP deployment?
Which basic process is used to select the best path for forwarding data?
By using the ipconfig command, a network administrator determines that a workstation has the address 192.168.3.38 with 29 bits set in the subnet mask. To what network does the workstation belong?
Refer to the exhibit. A PC is connected to a network. Which action will verify that the PC can communicate with its default gateway? VIZ OBRAZEK
What are two purposes for configuring a banner on a router? (Choose two.)
question.spatna: to prevent unauthorized access to the router
to provide a description of interface connections
question.spravna: to assist in legal prosecution for unauthorized access
question.spatna: to provide a welcome message to users who access the router

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Which application layer service was used to determine the IP address assigned to the URL? VIZ OBRAZEK
Which scenario describes a typical peer-to-peer network environment?
question.spatna: An employee downloads a file that is stored on a departmental file server.
An employee edits and reviews web pages on a web server that is located in the server farm.
A teleworker logs into a core router of the corporate network and makes a configuration change.
question.spravna: A user on one office PC sends output to a printer that is attached to the USB port of another PC in an adjacent office.

question.otazka: What type of IP address should be assigned to a web server?

Examine the graphic with current configurations. Host A in the Clerical offices failed and was replaced. Although a ping to 127.0.0.1 was successful, the replacement computer can not access the company network. What is the likely cause of the problem? VIZ OBRAZEK
During the encapsulation process, which identifiers are added at the transport layer?
question.spatna: two hosts at either end of the communication
two nodes on the local network exchanging the frame

question.otazka: The Layer 4 header contains which type of information to aid in the delivery of data?
As network administrator, what is the subnet mask that allows 510 hosts given the IP address 172.30.0.0?
In a Cisco IOS device, where is the startup-configuration file stored?
Refer to the exhibit. Host A is transmitting data to host B. What addresses will host A use to for the destination IP and MAC addresses in this communication? VIZ OBRAZEK

Refer to the exhibit. Cable 1 and cable 2 have the ends wired for specific physical layer requirements. The table lists each segment by number and the cable which has been installed by the network technician between the network components on that segment. From the data given, which segments have the correct cable installed? (Choose three.) VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. A router, whose table is shown, receives a packet that is destined for 192.168.1.4. How will router treat the packet? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The packet will be forwarded to the destination host.
question.spatna: The packet will be forwarded via FastEthernet 0/0.
The packet will be forwarded to the 192.168.1.3 next-hop address.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Each media link is labeled. What type of cable should be used to connect the different devices? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: Connection 1 – straight-through cable; Connection 2 – crossover cable; Connection 3 – straight-through cable
question.spatna: Connection 1 – rollover cable;Connection 2 – straight-through cable;Connection 3 – crossover cable
Connection 1 – crossover cable;Connection 2 – rollover cable; Connection 3 – crossover cable
Connection 1 – straight-through cable; Connection 2 – crossover cable; Connection 3 – crossover cable
Connection 1 – crossover cable; Connection 2 – straight-through cable; Connection 3 – crossover cable

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. What two facts can be determined from the information that is given? (Choose two.) VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The destination port indicates that an HTTP session has been initiated.
The data listed is associated with the transport layer.
question.spatna: This exchange is part of the three-way handshake.
The source port indicates that a Telnet session has been initiated.
The data is flowing from server to client.
The source port does not support communication with the destination port that is listed.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. What is required on host A for a network technician to create the initial configuration on Router1? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. What three statements are true about the IP configuration that is shown? (Choose three.) VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The address that is assigned to the computer represents private addressing.
The computer is unable to communicate outside of the local network
The prefix of the computer address is /27.
question.spatna: The network of this computer can have 126 hosts.
The IP address that is assigned to the computer is routable on the Internet.
The IP address that is assigned to the computer is a broadcast address.

question.otazka: Which three IPv4 addresses represent a broadcast for a subnet? (Choose three.)
Which combination of network id and subnet mask correctly identifies all IP addresses from 172.16.128.0 through 172.16.159.255?
Refer to the exhibit. When computer A sends a frame to computer D, what computers receive the frame? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spatna: only computer A and computer D
only computer B, computer C, and computer D

question.otazka: Which three statements characterize the transport layer protocols? (Choose three.)
question.spravna: TCP and UDP port numbers are used by application layer protocols.
question.spatna: TCP uses port numbers to provide reliable transportation of IP packets.
UDP uses windowing and acknowledgments for reliable transfer of data.
question.spravna: TCP uses windowing and sequencing to provide reliable transfer of data.
TCP is a connection-oriented protocol. UDP is a connectionless protocol.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. What two facts can be determined about the exhibited topology? (Choose two) VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: A single broadcast domain is present
question.spatna: Two logical address ranges are required.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. The command that is shown was issued on a PC. What does the IP address 192.168.33.2 represent? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: primary domain name server for the host
question.spatna: IP address of the homepage for the host
IP address of the website resolver1.mooki.local

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. What is the correct destination socket number for a web page request from Host A to the web server? VIZ OBRAZEK
Which type of media is immune to EMI and RFI? (Choose two.)
Refer to the exhibit. Which set of devices contains only intermediary devices? VIZ OBRAZEK
Refer to the exhibit. On the basis of the IP configuration that is shown, what is the reason that Host A and Host B are unable to communicate outside the local network? VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The gateway address was assigned a broadcast address.
question.spatna: Host A was assigned a network address.
Host B was assigned a multicast address.
Host A and Host B belong to different networks.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. Which logical topology best describes the exhibited network? VIZ OBRAZEK
What are three characteristics of CSMA/CD? (Choose three)
question.spatna: Devices can be configured with a higher transmission priority.
A jam signal indicates that the collision has cleared and the media is not busy.
question.spravna: A device listens and waits until the media is not busy before transmitting.
question.spatna: The device with the electronic token is the only one that can transmit after a collision.
question.spravna: All of the devices on a segment see data that passes on the network medium.
After detecting a collision, hosts can attempt to resume transmission after a random time delay has expired.

question.otazka: Refer to the exhibit. With the router running NAT, what IP addresses can be applied to the computer to allow access to the Internet? (Choose three) VIZ OBRAZEK
Which OSI layers offers reliable, connection-oriented data communication services?
Refer to the exhibit. Which two statements describe the information that is represented in the header? (Choose two) VIZ OBRAZEK
question.spravna: The destination port indicates a Telnet session.
The return segment will contain a source port of 23.
question.spatna: The UDP protocol is being used.
The next session originated from the client of this session will use the source port number 1335.

question.otazka: A PC can not connect to any remote websites, ping its default gateway, or ping a printer that is functioning properly on the local network segment. Which action will verify that the TCP/IP stack is functioning correctly on this PC?
question.spatna: Use the ipconfig /all command at the host’s command prompt.
question.spravna: Use the ping 127.0.0.1 command at the command prompt.
question.spatna: Use the traceroute command at the command prompt to identify any failures on the path to the gateway.
Use FTP to check for connectivity to remote sites.
Download a troubleshooting tool from the PC manufacturer’s website.
